properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , NICKNAME , PROFILE_PIC FROM MEMBER
SELECT CHAT_ID , FROM_NICKNAME , TO_NICKNAME , CHAT_CONTENT , CHAT_TIME FROM CHAT WHERE CHAT_TIME > ? ORDER BY CHAT_TIME
INSERT INTO CHAT ( CHAT_ID , FROM_NICKNAME , TO_NICKNAME , CHAT_CONTENT , CHAT_TIME ) VALUES ( seq_chat.nextval , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE )
